articles.title: US Nuclear Submarine Damaged In Underwater Collison In Asia - NDTV
articles.description: A US nuclear submarine was damaged after hitting an unidentified object while operating underwater in Asia, the US Navy said Thursday.
articles.content:
Navy said the extent of the damage is being examined and the incident investigated. (Representational)
